title: Bug 32856[Cell Editors] Can not see what value I am typing in the Properties
description: The "Value" field in property sheets does not scroll properly when entering avalue longer than the column size.It does scroll but it's behind, e.g. if Itype "org.eclipse.longtestcase.abcd", after I type "d" it may only scroll upto "a"  so I don't see what I am typing.This happens on WinXP, but on GTK it scrolls correctly.
